import colors from"assets/theme/base/colors";import borders from"assets/theme/base/borders";import typography from"assets/theme/base/typography";// Material Dashboard 2 React helper functions
import pxToRem from"assets/theme/functions/pxToRem";var inputBorderColor=colors.inputBorderColor,info=colors.info,grey=colors.grey,transparent=colors.transparent;var borderRadius=borders.borderRadius;var size=typography.size;var inputOutlined={styleOverrides:{root:{backgroundColor:transparent.main,fontSize:size.sm,borderRadius:borderRadius.md,"&:hover .MuiOutlinedInput-notchedOutline":{borderColor:inputBorderColor},"&.Mui-focused":{"& .MuiOutlinedInput-notchedOutline":{borderColor:info.main}}},notchedOutline:{borderColor:inputBorderColor},input:{color:grey[700],padding:pxToRem(12),backgroundColor:transparent.main},inputSizeSmall:{fontSize:size.xs,padding:pxToRem(10)},multiline:{color:grey[700],padding:0}}};export default inputOutlined;
